title: Why is there no cut through to enter Halyburton Park.  With current access to the nature park everyone has to drive exactly one mile out of their way to either enter or leave the park.  Take the number of car visits a year and you get the number of additional miles  wasted driving to this park.  This seems counter to intent (enjoyment and nature preservation) versus wasting gas.
